metadata.title: CVE-2021-3657 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in mbsync versions prior to 1.4.4. Due to inadequate handling of extremely large (>=2GiB) IMAP literals, malicious or compromised IMAP servers, and hypothetically even external email senders, could cause several different buffer overflows, which could conceivably be exploited for remote code execution.

criterions.comment: isync package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
